meta.name: description
meta.content: We are committed to excellence in the Ocean City School District. We provide a learning environment in which all students learn the New Jersey Student Learning Standards and acquire the skills, knowledge, and attitudes to become responsible contributing citizens in a changing global community.
ocnj, ocsd, oceancityschooldistrict, oceancitynj, oceancity, ocean, city

h1.strong: Welcome To The Ocean City School District!

td.p: We are committed to excellence in the Ocean City School District. We provide a learning environment in which all students learn the New Jersey Student Learning Standards and acquire the skills, knowledge, and attitudes to become responsible contributing citizens in a changing global community.

p.strong:
District Hours of Operation: 7:30 AM - 4:30 PM
Phone: 609.399.4161
